name: Oniric Kung Fu (MSX)
description:
Take on the role of a Kung Fu expert and fight against skillful enemies who will seek to defeat you on magnificent maps.

=======================================

Edition Physical

To obtain the physical version, enter our store:

Oniric Kung Fu - Physical Edition

=======================================

Download & installation

Download the .DSK and run it in an MSX emulator such as openMSX or blueMSX. 

We recommend openMSX.
